sentences.en: Conclusion: The lump crystal is one of the characteristics of Potentilla discolor Bunge.
sentences.cn: 结论“块晶”是翻白草的鉴别特征之一.

sentences.en: Objective : This paper defines the form of calcium oxalate crystal in Potentilla discolor Bunge.
sentences.cn: 目的 明确翻白草中草酸钙晶体的形态特征.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the Potentilla Discolor Bunge ( PDB ) on treat effect in experimental diabetic mouse.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察翻白草对实验性糖尿病大鼠治疗作用.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the hypoglycemic effects of extract of discolor Bunge on experimental diabetes in rats.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨翻白草对实验性糖尿病大鼠的降血糖作用.

sentences.en: Sapium discolor's morphological character seed - collecting and seedling - raising , cultural technique are presented.
sentences.cn: 介绍了山乌桕的形态特征, 采种 育苗和造林技术.

sentences.en: Smoking and some medications can also discolor teeth.
sentences.cn: 当然,抽烟和一些药物治疗也有可能引起牙齿褪色.

sentences.en: The disease gets its name from streaks of yellow and white that discolor the leaves.
sentences.cn: 这个病疫得名于它会使玉米的叶子褪色,变成黄白色.
